columns.name: nct_id
columns.description: Primary trial identifier. For ClinicalTrials.gov this is the NCT ID (e.g., NCT01234567). For CTIS-only trials, this is the EU CT number (e.g., 2022-500902-16-00).

columns.name: source
columns.description: Source registry for this record: clinicaltrials.gov, ctis, or clinicaltrials.gov+ctis (merged/correlated).

columns.name: secondary_id
columns.description: Secondary identifiers when available (comma-separated). For example, CTIS trials may list an NCT ID here.

columns.name: trial_link
columns.description: URL(s) to open the trial in its source registry. When merged, links may be separated by " | ".

columns.name: title
columns.description: Trial title as provided by the registry.

columns.name: study_type
columns.description: Study type as reported/normalized (e.g., INTERVENTIONAL, OBSERVATIONAL).

columns.name: study_design
columns.description: Normalized study design classification derived from registry metadata.

columns.name: phase
columns.description: Trial phase (registry-provided, normalized where possible).

columns.name: status
columns.description: Recruitment/overall status (e.g., COMPLETED, RECRUITING).

columns.name: sponsor
columns.description: Lead sponsor organization name.

columns.name: admission_date
columns.description: Registry posting/registration date in ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) when available.

columns.name: last_update_date
columns.description: Last update date in ISO-8601 (YYYY-MM-DD) when available.

columns.name: has_results
columns.description: Whether results/publications were detected (yes/no).

columns.name: results_last_update
columns.description: Best-effort date associated with results availability/publication update (YYYY-MM-DD) when available.

columns.name: pubmed_links
columns.description: PubMed URL(s) linked to the trial (best-effort), separated by " | ".

columns.name: conditions
columns.description: Conditions/medical indications field from the registry.

columns.name: interventions
columns.description: Interventions text extracted from the registry (may include type + name).

columns.name: intervention_types
columns.description: Comma-separated intervention type list (e.g., DRUG, RADIATION).

columns.name: primary_outcomes
columns.description: Primary outcome measures/endpoints text.

columns.name: secondary_outcomes
columns.description: Secondary outcome measures/endpoints text.

columns.name: inclusion_criteria
columns.description: Eligibility inclusion criteria text.

columns.name: exclusion_criteria
columns.description: Eligibility exclusion criteria text.

columns.name: locations
columns.description: Sites/locations text (best-effort) from the registry.

columns.name: brief_summary
columns.description: Brief summary/abstract text.

columns.name: detailed_description
columns.description: Longer detailed description text.

columns.name: therapeutic_class
columns.description: Normalized therapeutic strategy class (heuristic classification).

columns.name: focus_tags
columns.description: Comma-separated normalized tags describing trial focus (e.g., resectable_disease).

columns.name: pdac_match_reason
columns.description: Why the trial was included as PDAC-relevant (keyword/heuristic match reason).
